title: [BIG PROBLEM] Black screen after champion select. If u got this problem please read.
body:
Hallo, for 2 weeks ago I randomly got the massage "unable to connect to server please check your internet connection" after champion select. I have played lol on the same Internet over 2 years without any problem.  But the problem have nothing to do with my Network. I got it to work for a week but now the same problem is happening again. It comes out off no where.

I have tried all the fixes and guides riot have provied but nothing worked.  The guides can be found here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664

I have also tried all the guide that u can find on forums and youtube. This guy have put all the fixes in 1 video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jee3wg2CdN4

Non off the fixes and guides have worked for me. 


The only way I have been able to fix it is to connect to another Network and than it works for a week or 2.

i know i am not the only 1 with the problem and i hope we can find a solution to it. 





Please tell u have a way to fix it that is not mention .

EDIt: Wagwoo have testet and tried 2 fix the problem.

 Give him a Read if u have the same problem

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/8Qhj1gUA-entering-new-match-unable-to-connect-to-the-server-error-coupled-with-black-screen 

EDIT PART 2:
My LoL is working again after a day. I have not done anything.

replies.body: It doesn't work, none of it works. The most you get after doing any of these fixes is one quick connect to give false hope. But I think you'll find if you create another custom afterwards you're right back at square one. I've been scouring the Internet for 4 days (two of which I had my only days off last week and I just wanted to sit down and play some League) and these "fixes" are extremely rarely a permanent fix. It's more than likely an issue brought up by a recent update (if you look at posts made about this from years ago to today you'll find this commonly occurs after updates go through) and for w/e reason Riot needs to leave us in complete darkness instead of being helpful in any way shape or form.

It is so weird that it works yesterday and today i can't play. 

But thank u for your comment , i hope Riot will do something about this problem.

Heyo,

There's a couple of reasons you can't connect. 

It could be routing issues. Your ISP could have made changes recently to their routing tables as well as the route data is taking to leave their network. If that's the case, it would explain why you can only connect when on a different network, since I'm assuming it's a different ISP than the one you're on.

Less likely, your modem and/or router could be causing this as well, especially if it's old. Have you tried bypassing your router and connecting directly into the modem to see if the router is the problem? You could also borrow a modem to test with and see if it's not your hardware at home causing it. 

The easiest way to check to see if your router/modem could be a part of the problem would be to install a VPN (Virtual Personal Network). If the VPN is set up properly and you can connect to League, most likely not that hardware. If you can't, it could be your modem/router. 

If you've got a laptop, really easy to drag to a friend's house and test there, see if you can or can't connect there. If you can, issue with your network at home. If not, it's an issue with your laptop or our servers.

I am using the same Mac Book Pro (OS 10.11.4 15-inch, Mid 2012, 2.3 GHz Intel Core i7, 4 GB 1600 MHz DDR3, NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 512 MB) I have used for years to play LoL. After patch 6.8 however this "black screen of death" occurred after champ select finishes. Originally I thought it might have only been a 1 time thing so I tried a second game, resulting in an AFK buster penalty.

The most frustrating thing for me is that my work Mac tower, which is  older than my laptop, works fine; in fact I used it to finish my 5 game buster penalty last week. 

A few things to note: 1) I have tried restarting my router at home and that doesn't fix the issue. 2) I have attempted to play on other networks, including at my work where the tower works fine - none of these alt connections have worked. 3) I have reinstalled and tried to repair LoL but that too doesn't fix the problem.

I have seen on the forums that I am not the only one with this issue. Of course, I understand Mac users already make up a small portion of the LoL community, and even less probably play on Laptops,  but I would appreciate any assistance that could be provided. It is extremely frustrating to not be able to play a game I have invested both time and money into.

Please let me know if you require any addition information from me.

I've had this issue randomly off and on since about two patches ago. Sometimes repeated attempts to connect will get me into the game but there will be a slowly sliding up and down giant black bar and the entire screen will constantly flicker, making the game basically unplayable.

Usually restarting my computer fixes it (from either state) but that tends to result in getting into the game a little late. If it happens once on a given day it's very likely to happen again that day, but I'll often go days with no issue. I'm not 100% sure but I think it's more likely to happen if you other stuff running, particularly video (such as youtube), even if your computer has the hardware to easily handle both at once.

Thank u for your reply

Last time i had this problem i had no problems connecting on a friends network and when i got home i could play LoL at home again with no problems. It is so random when it works and not.  I have tried bypassing my router and connecting directly into the modem and that was not the problem. 

I have just sent A Process List, Network Analysis, NetworkInfo and Direct-X Diagnostic to Riot support and hope that might find the problem there,

I dunno about the ISP, how can i test that?

EDIT:
I have a new modem and router
Update: My lol is working again after a day. Dunno why. When the problem comes again I will tell u

Also having this issue. Everything worked fine for me yesterday, then I had to log off for like an hour - came back and this keeps happening. I'll get to the Champion screen and once everyone has chosen, it goes to the black screen and then tells me to reconnect a bunch of times until I finally get booted into the loading screen and they already started match. I've tried the fixes and still nothing is working and I'm already battling a lower queue penalty for being AFK when really I kept getting the black screen.

Didn't work for me :( Hoping Taric patch works

Sorry 2 hear, have u tried connecting 2 another network?

I am hoping the same

Sorry you guys are having the same problem but its really nice knowing I'm not the only one. Today marks almost 2 weeks since this has been happening.. Custom games/ normal games/ ranked games/ aram/ anything. After champ select I go black screen and can never connect to that game... I have been trying once everyday, to see if this problem is fixed.. Still no fix... All I get from riot is the usual....its on my end and to restart router etc... I have been playing 2 other games this last 2 weeks with NO connection problems whatsoever.. but League I cant connect for nothing.

I just don't get it.  I can sometimes connect, sometimes I can't like WTF why is it so random. And why is it so sporadic like I try 10 times and it takes so long but then I cant get in but then randomly I CAN UGH.
